title: GIANNENA 28/2: Strike and demonstration
content:
Thousands of protesters and strikers They manifest on the streets of the city, their anger and their opposition to Government Policy and in Ioannina, a year after state crime in Tempi.

Public workers and Private Sector, students, students, teachers, tractors or even farmers Without them, blocks of associations, student associations, organizations of extra -parliamentary Left and A/A space, found early in the space of the gathering, then demonstrated in the city center.

The previous period with responsibility of trade union leaders has been so lack of collective procedures in Associations and city workers, as well as a reduction in respectively Processes in the city's student and agricultural movement.

At the same time, the attempt of trade union leaders by clicking on justified rage for The state crime, to give both a "Memorandum" type of one -of -the -day. character in today's gathering based on one year closure by crime, as well as a climax and closing character of the previous mobilization.

Nevertheless, mass participation of the people and youth in today's demonstration, in conjunction with the previous mobilizations show that extensive rage for state Crime, linked to the ongoing attack they receive on their rights by the system of exploitation and barbarism and how there are significant attacks on this attack processes in the direction of the race.

Considering the above, Blocks and members of the class march, racing moves and Student Resistance tried with their materials and parables to show that the outlet for the accumulated rage and the impasses of the people and of the youth is in the unity of the people in the mass struggle and the organization of his struggle against the multiple fronts of the attack, against reasonable Withdrawal from the path of struggle and electoral expectations and delusions.
author: Αντίσταση στα Γιάννενα
